keyword: calories in n out double double
title: Calories in In-N-Out Double-Double
meta_description: Discover calories in n out double double: about 670 kcal per burger, plus full nutrition breakdown including protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and tweaks for custom orders.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out Double-Double: two beef patties, two cheese slices, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread, toasted bun; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, and customizations. Check In-N-Out's official site or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out Double-Double burger has ~670 kcal and ~37 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal Style (extra spread, grilled onions, mustard-fried)

faqs.q: How many calories in n out double double?
faqs.a: Approximately 670 kcal for the standard burger.

faqs.q: What's the protein in an In-N-Out Double-Double?
faqs.a: About 37 g of protein from the two beef patties and cheese.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in n out double double?
faqs.a: Around 1440 mg, mostly from the cheese, spread, and bun.

faqs.q: Calories in In-N-Out Double-Double without the bun?
faqs.a: Protein Style version is ~430 kcal, saving ~240 kcal.

faqs.q: Does the Double-Double have trans fats?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1 g from the beef patties.
